about_the_game:
Mutant Fish Survival is an arcade game with a roguelike elements, where you have to survive surrounded by underwater monsters.

The character controlled by the player has many abilities that are tied to different parts of his body. During the game level, the character undergoes random mutations, after which parts change randomly. Because of this, the player will constantly discover something new and adapt to changing conditions, this will not let you get bored.

The wide variety of crazy enemies is another distinctive feature of the game. In addition to their appearance, floating monsters differ in types of attacks and behavior: large, small, biting, shooting, shooting with electricity and sharp fins, robotic fish, zombie fish, slime fish, broccoli fish... in general there are a lot of them.

In each level the player will have to survive for a certain time.
Enemies will surround you from all sides, you will have to maneuver and evade attacks in order to survive in an intense arcade battle.

With each level you complete, you will receive points that can be spent on unlocking new parts for your monster. This will allow you to improve its characteristics and become even stronger.

Mutant Fish Survival is a bit of a arcade-roguelike, so if you lose, you'll have to start all over again, but you'll definitely see at least something new on your next try. And after completing all the levels to the end, try again, the game is not over yet.

All content is fully available, and over time there will be more and more of it - new underwater monsters, bosses and character abilities will be added.
